name: Alphabetic postal code should be rejected by validation
description: Verifies that the Add Customer form enforces numeric-only validation on the post code field. Alphabetic postal codes should be rejected.
descriptionHtml: Verifies that the Add Customer form enforces numeric-only validation on the post code field. Alphabetic postal codes should be rejected.
statusMessage:
The following asserts failed:
	Postal codes should contain only numeric characters, but alphabetic post code was accepted. expected [false] but found [true]

steps.name: Navigate to admin panel by clicking Bank Manager Login
Register new client: James Mensah, postcode ABCDE
